message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I believe a starting price of $2,000,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to commit up to $1,200,000 for it. I hope we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $2,000,000 is really the lowest I can go right now.  This product is a game-changer, and I'm confident it will bring you a significant return on your investment. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $1,600,000?

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I am still unable to meet you at $1,600,000. My maximum budget remains at $1,200,000. I hope we can find a middle ground that satisfies both parties.
